surveys.prompt:
- Ask user to give a rating between 1-5 
 - if rating of question less than of equal to 3, ask a textual response asking what should we improve 
 - if the rating of the question is greater than 3, ask a textual response asking what did they like

- Ask the user to give rating between 1-5 to the newely added feature in the game  
 - Ask the use about one thing that they linked about the new update. the answer will be in text format 
 - Ask the user about one they they would like to improve about the new update. the answer will be in text format
